Reviews.Title: “Four Day weekend”

Reviews.Content: im retired 25 yr travel consultant homework booking hotel looking hotel suisse perfect location short walk street spanish steps hotel located narrow street hello ancient rome building hotel located third floor elevator easy access compare hotel bed hotel double bed requested comfortable husband softer mattress slept ok due lots walking day bathroom functional soaps shampoo hairdryer bedding towels nice spotlessly clean staff friendly helpful spoke english tv english channels bbc cnn yuk light continental breakfast delivered five minutes quick phone call requesting ready morning overall hotel suisse charming value definately stay recommend hotel arrange private driver round trip meet airport outside baggage claim drop front hotel cost euro 5000 worth penny 45 minute ride airport traffic mildly lived europe 5 recommend driving inside city rome
